TopicTitle: Modding Monday: KIS/KAS for 1.1 alpha testing!

Articles.Content: This thread is a temporary place to test pre-release version of KIS/KAS! Please do not consider the binaries posted here as early versions of the the mods! Try it and enjoy! #KSP
wow i'm early... looking forward to the devnotes though!

23 minutes ago, ThePerpetual said:

wow i'm early... looking forward to the devnotes though!

Wait a day and they'll appear.

1 hour ago, RA3236 said:

Wait a day and they'll appear.

Or possibly 2...

Sorry, that i can't post "Epic Legendary Intense Massive Heroic Vengeful Dramatic Music" but...

Yes, It's like magic! Every week the "HOLY DEV-NOTES"  appear and deliver new pieces for my big(!) incredible(!!) puzzle(!!?) made of...puzzle(?!)...pieces(?!?)...

But! They don't take 4,99$ every week and deliver just a 1ml cup of horrible smelling paint or a miniaturized plastic wheel for my "fantastic, intelligent, selfmade AND selfdestroying roboter...no...sry... it's called...CYBORG...because i've paid 1999,99$" 

They...(heroic music)...deliver(!!!!)... PUZZLE PIECES of NEXT GEN RELEAAAAASEEE  <- yes, that ARE FOUR exclamation marks and i think my caps lock is...locked.

Uhm, one moment, are the notes better or worse than the cyborg...  ...

OK...I try again: >>>!!!PUZZLE - PIECES!!!!<<< - Yes...  i think it's better ( but i will make a poll) - soooo; 

Many words; (indeed, i mean sarcasm, for the people which...doesn't care, but are still focused) it's just one chance, just one chance, to come back here and tell our enemies :

Yes, they may take our lives, but they never take our KSP - Team! 


Damn boys (are there girls in your team? - I have a mobile phone, whatsapp, i'm living in a flat - powered by REAL electricity - i like love movies - ok, that was a lie (the real electricity, of course)...back to topic:)) ...in the last few years i often thought; i bought this  awesome "early access" game, which will never get gold status, but what the - you made it!

You made a lot of incredible, sometimes horrible, but...(i already said incredible, didn't i?!?)... work... and money...and money... and work... and you just don't want to die -  you still mutate!

...ok WTF...keep up the good work...is there any kissing smiley on board?! i try....

:*

EDIT: PLEASE insert a kissing smiley

Ah, I was wondering when a 1.1 update would come out for these mods.  Sweet! 

Of all the mods in KSP, these are the ones I would love the most to be incorporated into the actual game.  All the other mods add a bit of functionality here or there but this fundamentally changes just about everything about how the game is played in a positive way.
Alas, being a 2nd class citizen, I cannot participate.

u ok bro?

All work and no play?

Edited April 20, 2016 by fireblade274
editting quote
I've been using the pre-release KIS/KAS in 1.1 (64-bit)  Works like a charm.  Some minor bugs there, but the modder, Igorz, is working on those.  Great mod!!
And things always work, eventually,  with am Igor on the job. Those extra fingers really speed up the typing speed. And you can barely see the stitching. ..

12 hours ago, RA3236 said:

Wait a day and they'll appear.

As always, remember that Squad is operating on UTC-6.

Their office hours (as if they ever bothered with that) ends way past midnight in most parts of the world, outside the americas.

Just now, Curveball Anders said:

As always, remember that Squad is operating on UTC-6.

Their office hours (as if they ever bothered with that) ends way past midnight in most parts of the world, outside the americas.

I'm UTC+10, so they end at 10am the next day.

KIS/KAS. Kerbal Planetary Base Systems & EPLp rank the highest in my install list, for 1.1.

2 out of 3 aint bad.

kudos to Igor for his patience and commitment (thumbs-up)

Jai-Ho!
KIS/KAS literally revolutionizes the gameplay. I just can't build stations without these mods, they're the most useful EVA enhancement ever made.
